definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
to execute sb and mince his flesh and bones (archaic form of retribution)

sentences.english: The method need not minced and hashed meat sauce and natural flavor.
sentences.chinese: 其法不用醢醬而有自然之味。

definition: marshland/swamp/salted or pickled vegetables/to mince/to shred/to mince human flesh and bones/Taiwan pr. [ju1]
to execute sb and mince his flesh and bones (archaic form of retribution)
finely chopped meat or vegetables/powdered or fragmentary
remains of a sacrifice or a meal
see 鱠魚|鲙鱼[kuai4 yu2]/variant of 膾|脍[kuai4]
cutting off the ears as punishment
